mapper.insert: insert into t_adm_assignment_board( no, start_Date, end_Date, title, content, org_File_Name, real_File_Name, file_Path ) values( seq_adm_assignment_board_no.nextval, to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{title}, #{content}, #{orgFileName}, #{realFileName}, #{file_Path} )
